entry.title: Euclid
entry.subtitle: ~ 350 - 250 BCE
entry.short: Euclid, sometimes called Euclid of Alexandria to distinguish him from Euclid of Megara, was a Greek mathematician, often referred to as the "founder of geometry" or the "father of geometry". He was active in Alexandria during the reign of Ptolemy I.
entry.name: euclid
